content:
TITLE: Executing MacOS Setup Commands for KrillinAI
DESCRIPTION: Terminal commands to prepare and run the KrillinAI executable on macOS. These commands remove quarantine attributes, set executable permissions, and launch the application, addressing the signing issues with macOS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo xattr -cr ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_desktop_macOS_arm64  
sudo chmod +x ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_desktop_macOS_arm64  
./KrillinAI_1.0.0_desktop_macOS_arm64
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring MacOS Security for Non-Desktop KrillinAI Version
DESCRIPTION: Terminal commands for the non-desktop version of KrillinAI on macOS. These commands remove quarantine attributes, set executable permissions, and launch the application for users of the standard version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo xattr -rd com.apple.quarantine ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_macOS_arm64
sudo chmod +x ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_macOS_arm64
./KrillinAI_1.0.0_macOS_arm64
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing MacOS Terminal Commands for Running Non-Desktop Version
DESCRIPTION: Commands to bypass macOS security restrictions for the non-desktop version of KrillinAI by removing quarantine attributes and making the file executable before launching the service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/docs/README_zh.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo xattr -rd com.apple.quarantine ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_macOS_arm64
sudo chmod +x ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_macOS_arm64
./KrillinAI_1.0.0_macOS_arm64
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Executing MacOS Terminal Commands for Running Unsigned Desktop App
DESCRIPTION: Commands to bypass macOS security restrictions for running the unsigned desktop version of KrillinAI by removing quarantine attributes and making the file executable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/docs/README_zh.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo xattr -cr ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_desktop_macOS_arm64
sudo chmod +x ./KrillinAI_1.0.0_desktop_macOS_arm64 
./KrillinAI_1.0.0_desktop_macOS_arm64
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating yt-dlp Video Downloader
DESCRIPTION: Command for updating the yt-dlp video downloader when experiencing errors. Users should run this command in the terminal from the bin directory of the software to update the downloader to the latest version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/docs/faq.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./yt-dlp.exe -U
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Showing Required KrillinAI Directory Structure
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the expected file structure for the KrillinAI software directory. The structure shows the main executable, a config folder containing the config.toml configuration file, and an optional cookies.txt file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/docs/faq.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
/── config/
│   └── config.toml
├── cookies.txt （<- 可选的cookies.txt文件）
└── krillinai.exe
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying File Structure for KrillinAI Project
DESCRIPTION: Shows the expected directory structure after exporting the cookies.txt file, including the location of the config file, tasks folder, and the main executable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/docs/get_cookies.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
/── config/
│   └── config.toml
├── tasks/
├── cookies.txt （<- 导出的cookies.txt文件）
└── krillinai.exe
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Embedding Star History Chart using Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Markdown code that embeds a SVG chart from the star-history.com API to visualize the GitHub star count history for the KrillinAI repository. The chart is generated dynamically based on the repository name and displays stars over time.
SOURCE: https://github.com/krillinai/krillinai/blob/master/docs/README_fr.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
[![Star History Chart](https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=krillinai/KrillinAI&type=Date)](https://star-history.com/#krillinai/KrillinAI&Date)
```
